concept.title: Debugging the PRM
concept.shortdesc: This document describes how to debug the PRM using internal macros.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: Use the provided KTrace and BTrace macros to debug your PRM implementation.
These kernel services allow you to generate and capture trace information in a manner designed to minimise the impact on a running system.

section.title: Using KTrace
section.p: Use the KTRACE macro with KRESMANAGER for debug print messages in the code.

section.title: Using the kernel trace tool
section.p: The BTRACE category, TCategory::EResourceManager, and a number of sub categories are defined and used to trace the progress of all operations on the PRM. All tracing sub categories are wrapped with a macro definition. Implement macro definitions in e32\include\drivers\rescontrol_trace.h to replace BTrace with other tracing methods.

link.linktext: Implement the PSL for the target
Port client drivers to use the PRM
